name: Ambitious Dragonborn
oracle_text: Ambitious Dragonborn enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control and creature cards in your graveyard.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: The raging green dragon left destruction—and at least one admirer—in its wake.

name: Armor of Shadows
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"What's softer than silk, stronger than steel, and quieter than thought?"
—Warlock riddle

name: Arms of Hadar
oracle_text: Creatures target player controls get -2/-2 until end of turn.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Burning slowly into annihilation, the elder evil Hadar grants fearsome powers to warlocks willing to help satiate its dark hunger.

name: Astral Confrontation
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent you're attacking.
Exile target creature.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "After voyaging all the way through the Astral Sea with my life hanging by a silver thread, fighting the mind flayer was the easy part."

name: Atrocious Experiment
oracle_text: Target player mills two cards, draws two cards, and loses 2 life. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: There is no line Jon Irenicus would not cross to regain his lost immortality.

name: Avenging Hunter
oracle_text:
Trample
When Avenging Hunter enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "I will remember my friends. But you? You won't be remembered at all."

name: Band Together
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "Boo, let's see how this miscreant handles a furry missile of justice!"

name: Bane's Invoker
oracle_text: Wind Walk — {8}: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 and gain flying until end of turn.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "The Lord of Darkness elevates only those who serve."

name: Basilisk Gate
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Gates you control. Activate only as a sorcery.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: The eastern passage into the city is filled with reminders that the patriars are literally looking down on you.

name: Bhaal's Invoker
oracle_text: Scorching Ray — {8}: Bhaal's Invoker deals 4 damage to each opponent.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "The Lord of Murder has freed me from the shackles of mortal laws and gifted me with fire to carry out his will."

name: Black Dragon Gate
oracle_text:
Black Dragon Gate enters the battlefield tapped.
As Black Dragon Gate enters the battlefield, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: An imposing visage that looms over all who would rise above their station.

name: Blessed Hippogriff // Tyr's Blessing

card_faces.name: Blessed Hippogriff
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Blessed Hippogriff attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.

card_faces.name: Tyr's Blessing
card_faces.oracle_text: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Blur
oracle_text:
Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Draw a card.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "It's as much of a trick of the mind as it is a trick of the eye."

name: Bojuka Bog
oracle_text:
Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield tapped.
When Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield, exile target player's graveyard.
{T}: Add {B}.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Breath Weapon
oracle_text: Breath Weapon deals 2 damage to each non-Dragon creature.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "In the name of Tempus, Lord of Battles, you will die honorably in righteous fire."

name: Bronze Walrus
oracle_text:
When Bronze Walrus enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Candlekeep Sage
oracle_text: Commander creatures you own have "When this creature enters or leaves the battlefield, draw a card."
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: You love the smell of dusty tomes, the flicker of candles during late-night reading, and the old texts that bring to life the scholars who have come before.

name: Carefree Swinemaster
oracle_text: Whenever Carefree Swinemaster attacks, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, create a 2/2 green Boar creature token that's tapped and attacking.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "C'mon, Boodigan, let's go see what kind of treasure this place has!"

name: Carnelian Orb of Dragonkind
oracle_text: {T}: Add {R}. If that mana is spent on a Dragon creature spell, it gains haste until end of turn.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: The essence of red dragon burns within, always ready to rise with wrath.

name: Chain Devil
oracle_text: Animate Chains — When Chain Devil enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a nontoken creature.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: To these fiends, there's no symphony more beautiful than the melodies of rattling chains and ripping flesh.

name: Changeling Outcast
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Changeling Outcast can't block and can't be blocked.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: A mercurial face sows distrust. Distrust reaps a lonely life.

name: Charcoal Diamond
oracle_text:
Charcoal Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Every facet a portent of Kelemvor's inevitable judgment.

name: Chardalyn Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: First discovered in ancient Netheril, chardalyn stones absorb and hold magical energy, enabling constructs to be infused with fearsome power and unnatural malice.

name: Circle of the Land Druid
oracle_text:
When Circle of the Land Druid enters the battlefield, you may mill four cards. (You may put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.)
Natural Recovery — When Circle of the Land Druid dies, return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Citadel Gate
oracle_text:
Citadel Gate enters the battlefield tapped.
As Citadel Gate enters the battlefield, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: A beacon of order and safety, for those who can afford it.

name: Cliffgate
oracle_text:
Cliffgate enters the battlefield tapped.
As Cliffgate enters the battlefield, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: A partition between the hopeless living and the restless dead.

name: Cloak of the Bat
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has flying and haste.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"How about the power of silent flight? Does that suit your needs, cutthroat?"
—Rivalen Blackhand, proprietor of Sorcerous Sundries

name: Cloakwood Swarmkeeper
oracle_text: Gathered Swarm — Whenever one or more tokens enter the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Cloakwood Swarmkeeper.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: When he's threatened, the forest buzzes and the air hums with dragonfly wings.

name: Clockwork Fox
oracle_text: When Clockwork Fox leaves the battlefield, you draw two cards and each opponent draws a card.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"It might just be my greatest invention yet: A lovable pet that *decreases* the need for chores!"
—Jan Jansen

name: Colossal Badger // Dig Deep

card_faces.name: Colossal Badger
card_faces.oracle_text: When Colossal Badger enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
card_faces.flavor_text: Rip through enough dirt and you'll eventually find something edible.

card_faces.name: Dig Deep
card_faces.oracle_text: Choose target creature. Mill four cards, then put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each creature card milled this way.

set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Rip through enough dirt and you'll eventually find something edible.

name: Command Tower
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Durlag's Tower is filled with enough treasure to last a lifetime, and enough traps to drastically shorten that lifetime.

name: Compulsive Research
oracle_text: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"

name: Contact Other Plane
oracle_text:
Roll a d20.
1—9 | Draw two cards.
10—19 | Scry 2, then draw two cards.
20 | Scry 3, then draw three cards.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Coronation of Chaos
oracle_text: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn. Goad them. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: When Sarevok's deception was unmasked, the cheering crowd erupted into an outraged mob.

name: Crib Swap
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Exile target creature. Its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Dauthi Horror
oracle_text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Dauthi Horror can't be blocked by white creatures.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Dawnbringer Cleric
oracle_text:
When Dawnbringer Cleric enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Cure Wounds — You gain 2 life.
• Dispel Magic — Destroy target enchantment.
• Gentle Repose — Exile target card from a graveyard.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Deadly Dispute
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "That's a pretty ring! Trade you my knife for it."

name: Decanter of Endless Water
oracle_text:
You have no maximum hand size.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Now, remember: Under no circumstances should you utter the word 'geyser' in the same room as—oh, blast it!"
—Bindlehaim, Upper City merchant

name: Demon Bolt
oracle_text:
Demon Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Foretell {R} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Burn them from the sky."
—Varragoth

name: Dimir Signet
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members—and the doomed.

name: Dire Mimic
oracle_text:
Flash
{T}, Sacrifice Dire Mimic: Add one mana of any color.
{3}: Dire Mimic becomes a Shapeshifter artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Sometimes the closet *is* the monster.

name: Draconic Lore
oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a Dragon.
Draw three cards.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: The wyrmling studied the ancient carvings and dreamed of a day when her own exploits would be immortalized in stone.

name: Dragonborn Looter
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Erdur never thought of it as stealing. Treasure simply didn't deserve to be stuck underground where no one could admire it.

name: Dread Linnorm // Scale Deflection

card_faces.name: Dread Linnorm
card_faces.oracle_text: Dread Linnorm can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or less.
card_faces.flavor_text: A serpent's cruelty, a dragon's appetite.

card_faces.name: Scale Deflection
card_faces.oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature and untap it. It gains hexproof until end of turn. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: A serpent's cruelty, a dragon's appetite.

name: Dream Fracture
oracle_text:
Counter target spell. Its controller draws a card.
Draw a card.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: In her dream, Lola gazed into a mirror. Her familiar features warped, her jaw stretching wider and wider until it cracked and her reflection pulled her into its gaping maw.

name: Druidic Ritual
oracle_text: You may mill three cards. Then return up to one creature card and up to one land card from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Bone, root, and seed—the past, the present, and future in one handful of earth.

name: Druid of the Emerald Grove
oracle_text:
When Druid of the Emerald Grove enters the battlefield, search your library for up to two basic land cards and reveal them, then roll a d20.
1—9 | Put those cards into your hand, then shuffle.
10—19 | Put one of those cards onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
20 | Put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Earth Tremor
oracle_text: Earth Tremor deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the number of lands you control.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Every cave-in is Moradin telling you to leave the earth where it is."
—Halgar, dwarven recluse

name: Ettercap // Web Shot

card_faces.name: Ettercap
card_faces.oracle_text: Reach
card_faces.flavor_text:
"Filthy, sticky, vile, noxious—and I haven't even started describing the webs."
—Erinis, gloom stalker

card_faces.name: Web Shot
card_faces.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Filthy, sticky, vile, noxious—and I haven't even started describing the webs."
—Erinis, gloom stalker

oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: There is an immense diversity of life in the Underdark, almost all of which can kill you.

name: Explore
oracle_text:
You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: An explorer's reward is a view of tomorrow's possibilities.

name: Fang Dragon // Forktail Sweep

card_faces.name: Fang Dragon
card_faces.oracle_text: Flying
card_faces.flavor_text:
"Watch out for its teeth, tail, claws, wings, back, and front."

card_faces.name: Forktail Sweep
card_faces.oracle_text: Forktail Sweep deals 1 damage to each creature you don't control. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Watch out for its teeth, tail, claws, wings, back, and front."
—Olga, cavalier

oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"On vile wings and bloody wind, the swarm will rise."
—Skyclave inscription

name: Fire Diamond
oracle_text:
Fire Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Every facet aglow like iron in Moradin's mighty forge.

name: Flaming Fist
oracle_text: Commander creatures you own have "Whenever this creature attacks, it gains double strike until end of turn."
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: You carry the security of Baldur's Gate on your shoulders, and you welcome the weight of responsibility.

name: Flaming Fist Officer
oracle_text: Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Flaming Fist Officer.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "Got the remaining citizens to safety! These miscreants have an appointment with my spear."

name: Forest
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: You know that hiexel bark produces a lot of smoke when burned, but why would Rilsa Rael need so much of it?

name: Genasi Enforcers
oracle_text:
Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)
{1}{R}: Creatures you control named Genasi Enforcers get +1/+0 until end of turn.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

When Ghastly Death Tyrant enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Death Ray — Creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Goggles of Night
oracle_text:
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, scry 1, then draw a card. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Goliath Paladin enters the battlefield, you take the initiative.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "Why do you cower in the darkness, little gnolls? If you would challenge me, step into the light."

name: Gray Harbor Merfolk
oracle_text:
Gray Harbor Merfolk can't be blocked.
Gray Harbor Merfolk gets +2/+0 as long as you control a commander that's a creature or planeswalker.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Harbormasters tend to forget that security shouldn't stop at the surface.

card_faces.oracle_text: Mill four cards. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

oracle_text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it and tap up to one target creature defending player controls.

Vigilance

Deathtouch
When Guildsworn Prowler dies, if it wasn't blocking, draw a card.

{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Highland Forest
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
Highland Forest enters the battlefield tapped.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Tread carefully! The last time I walked this path, half the snowdrifts were, in fact, sleeping trolls. I've never run so fast in my life!"
—Iskene, Kannah storyteller

name: Hoarding Ogre
oracle_text:
Whenever Hoarding Ogre attacks, roll a d20.
1—9 | Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Ingenious Artillerist

set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "Sure, you can help me calibrate the aiming mechanism. Stand over there."

oracle_text: Vicious Mockery — When Insufferable Balladeer enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn. Goad it. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

name: Island
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: As you sail past the imposing Seatower of Balduran, you realize that breaking your friend out of that prison will be much harder than you thought.

name: Izzet Signet
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

name: Jade Orb of Dragonkind
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}. When you spend this mana to cast a Dragon creature spell, it enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it and gains hexproof until your next turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Flying

name: Manor Gate

{T}: Add {G} or one mana of the chosen color.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Marble Diamond
oracle_text:
Marble Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Every facet a benediction of Lathander's light.

name: Marching Duodrone
oracle_text: Whenever Marching Duodrone attacks, each player creates a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "One-two! One-two! One-two! One-two!"

name: Martial Impetus
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, each other creature that's attacking one of your opponents gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Marut
oracle_text:
Trample
When Marut enters the battlefield, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast it, create a Treasure token for each mana from a Treasure spent to cast it. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Master Chef
oracle_text: Commander creatures you own have "This creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it" and "Other creatures you control enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on them."
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: You never thought "rations" was an appropriate term for the feasts you prepare for your party.

name: Minimus Containment
oracle_text:
Enchant nonland permanent
Enchanted permanent is a Treasure artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color," and it loses all other abilities. (If it was a creature, it's no longer a creature.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Mold Folk
oracle_text:
Lifelink
Mold Harvest — {1}, Sacrifice another creature or an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mold Folk.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Corpses of those slain by russet mold grow new moldies. Not the legacy most of us aspire to."
—Elminster

name: Mortuary Mire
oracle_text:
Mortuary Mire enters the battlefield tapped.
When Mortuary Mire enters the battlefield, you may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.
{T}: Add {B}.

name: Moss Diamond
oracle_text:
Moss Diamond enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Every facet a promise of Chauntea's bounty.

name: Mountain
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: As you explore the slums of the Outer City, you keep hearing rumors of a den of werewolves in the caves below Dusthawk Hill.

name: Murder
oracle_text: Destroy target creature.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Pave your path to the throne with yet another body if you must, Sarevok. It will make your stolen godhood no less false."
—Gorion, wise mentor

name: Myconid Spore Tender
oracle_text: Infesting Spores — When Myconid Spore Tender enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Myconid colonies grow and expand at an aggressive rate, but they are friendly and peaceful unless provoked.

name: Myrkul's Edict
oracle_text:
Roll a d20.
1—9 | Choose an opponent. That player sacrifices a creature.
10—19 | Each opponent sacrifices a creature.
20 | Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Myrkul's Invoker
oracle_text: Psychic Blades — {8}: Creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain menace until end of turn. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "Your death will make a fine tribute for the Lord of Bones."

name: Natural Reclamation
oracle_text:
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Nature's Lore
oracle_text: Search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Druidcraft is a simple invocation to spirits of nature, promising a glimpse of nature's secrets.

name: Navigation Orb
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Navigation Orb: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and/or Gate cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Travel the world without ever leaving the comfort of home.

name: Nefarious Imp
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever one or more permanents you control leave the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: It listens to all of their plans and plots creative ways to turn them to ruin.

name: Nimbleclaw Adept
oracle_text: Bigby's Hand — {T}: Untap two other target permanents. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "Don't worry, I can reach it."

name: Nimblewright Schematic
oracle_text: When Nimblewright Schematic enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"While it is certainly a unique touch, Jan, does the mustache really need to be there?"
—High Artificer Andar Beech

name: Oceanus Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Oceanus Dragon enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. Goad it. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Orzhov Signet
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: The sigil holds different meanings depending on its form and presentation. While some wear it as a sign of status, others wear it as a sign of debt.

name: Pack Attack
oracle_text:
Attacking creatures get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of players being attacked.
Draw a card.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

oracle_text:
Enchant creature

set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Patron of the Arts

Flying

name: Plains

Draw a card.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

Enchant creature

set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

Flying
{2}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

name: Psychic Impetus
oracle_text:
Enchant creature

name: Roving Harper
oracle_text: When Roving Harper enters the battlefield, draw a card.

name: Run Away Together

name: Sakura-Tribe Elder

set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: There were no tombstones in orochi territory. Slain warriors were buried with a tree sapling, so they would become a part of the forest after death.

name: Scaled Nurturer
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}. When you spend this mana to cast a Dragon creature spell, you gain 2 life.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "Life always starts small. Only time will tell what heights it may reach."

name: Scion of Halaster
oracle_text: Commander creatures you own have "The first time you would draw a card each turn, instead look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your graveyard and the other back on top of your library. Then draw a card."
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
